issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Refactor runtime expression support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5013](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5013). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Refactor the runtime/compiled expression support to fix tech debt and prepare for implementing COUNT
